extendedInfo.description: The Staples mobile app does more than put 100,000 Staples products in the palm of your hand. You also get 150 advanced features.So go ahead â redeem coupons and rewards. Compare product prices and features. Scan a barcode to check product availability. View your order history and update shopping lists. And above all, add some easy to your workday.See the Staples Mobile App in action here when you watch the video:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dRzUSaoXq-8&feature=itunesFaster, simple reordering.â¢ A virtual supply closet for easy reorderingâ¢ Build lists using your order history, scanning products in store and browsing onlineAll your rewards.â¢ Paperless, hassle-free Rewards, right to youâ¢ Access your Rewards history, redeemable checks and current balanceâ¢ Get alerts when Rewards are close to expiringSo many deals.â¢ All your deals are one touch awayâ¢ Dashboard features our Weekly Ad, coupon wallet and store check-in couponsFind what you need.â¢ Find your ink or tonerâ¢ Find the nearest storeâ¢ Scan products anywhere to find item detailsEasy online shopping.â¢ Compare products and read reviewsâ¢ See in-store inventory**** Application Permissions ****TAKE PICTURES AND VIDEOS (CAMERA ACCESS)This application will use camera when you scan QR code, Barcode or optionally when you are requesting product concierge help. (E.g. Scan products to compare features, Scan receipt to file Easy Rebate)FINE (GPS) LOCATIONThis application will use GPS to determine store locations, directions to store and Store check-ins (optional coupons for checking in)MODIFY/DELETE USB STORAGE CONTENTS MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTSThis access allows you to move the application to SD card as you manage your storage**** Application Permissions ****

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: Does not close and when trying to log in.  Server returned error always.
reviews.author: Nancy Hanie

reviews.title: Epic 4G Touch
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app that you can load your rewards card on and even Passes.  I have noticed that the rewards card barcode is smaller than that of the coupons, which makes it hard to scan.  A good feature to add is an indoor map of where things are but that doesn\'t effect my rating.
reviews.author: trolloses

reviews.title: Check fail
reviews.comment: Check in requires GPS (requires view of the sky) which is impossible in a building. Devs, use AGPS or identify location by in-store hotspot.
reviews.author: Samuel Yuen

reviews.title: Big bloated app
reviews.comment: Check-in feature rarely works as of july 2013. Still not fixed, and location still does not know where I am at even when I am in the store. Ability to use rewards is a good feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Crashed and deleted my order TWICE in a row. It was slow and unwieldy to begin with. I was very disappointed with this app. The website is better. When delivery came I was very pleased either the service. But again,  this app didn\'t get that done with any sort of \"easy button\"; I had to go to the Web to place my order.
reviews.author: Samuel Sherrill

reviews.title: Easy Rebate submission not easy
reviews.comment: I loaded this app to try to submit Easy Rebates. The app offers the ability to scan the barcode on the rebate submission form but that is not the only number that must be entered and the scanned number populates the wrong field on my Android device. On my iPad, I couldn\'t even get the picture of the barcode to work properly-it would just return to the screen for data entry but no numbers were populated. Junk. About to uninstall this from both of my devices now. Staples, make the easy rebate easier!
reviews.author: Jamie Carbery

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I need a desk and chair the checkout was fast
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Retarded overpriced deals
reviews.comment: For example PLY Pen drive, regular price 19.99,discounted this week for 9.99....meanwhile if you look it up on the Internet it shows 9.99 at best buy... What a ripoff
reviews.author: E Stu

reviews.title: Does not work for me at all
reviews.comment: Brought it to use a $10 off $75 coupon on Sunday and while it worked on my pc under the Bluestacks faux cell phone and spoofer to pretend I was in store so I had the coupon ready.  I get to the store and check in only on my phone the app weas telling me it could not determine if I was in the store WHILE I WAS IN THE STORE!!!!
reviews.author: k ma

reviews.title: Update broke check-in
reviews.comment: The recent update has broke check in ability. It freezes and force closes when checking coupon wallet
reviews.author: Bill Artinger

reviews.title: Unable to view details
reviews.comment: Samsung S3 when viewing the weekly ad, I get an error that the problem is temporary, it\'s never worked on any weekly ad s. Please fix, and eating will increase.
reviews.author: Richard Chian

reviews.title: Broken app!
reviews.comment: Can\'t view check in coupons - always returns server error. please fix!
reviews.author: Allan H

reviews.title: Terrible.
reviews.comment: Slow, constant server errors. Locks out of rewards. Each version has had all of these issues. Sometimes clearing data/cache helps but not always.
reviews.author: Cory Buczkowski

reviews.title: Check in coupons broken
reviews.comment: For the past week I\'ve been unable to view my check in coupons. I get a server error message.
reviews.author: Paul Savickas

reviews.title: Difficult
reviews.comment: This app is not easy. It doesn\'t work. It keeps \"loading\" and never moves past the \"loading\" message. Ridiculous and useless.
reviews.author: Nicole Zimmerer

reviews.title: How do you exit the app on the Nexus 7
reviews.comment: It seems you have to use the menu button to exit this app however it does not provide a menu button on the Nexus 7.  Why doesn\'t this app exit from the back button like every other android app?
reviews.author: Rick Looper

reviews.title: Security token error messages
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy s4  I keep getting token errors them the whole app crashes.
reviews.author: Channie Goldstein

reviews.comment: What an incprehensibkr mess. Ready to uninstall.
reviews.author: Doug Smith

reviews.title: Can\'t Get Out
reviews.comment: I love Staples but I can\'t get out of this app once I get in, unless I start my phone. Please fix the app.
reviews.author: Sheryl Kaczmarek

reviews.title: Poorly designed app
reviews.comment: Works intermittently, clunky navigation & exiting the app is in the wrong place.
reviews.author: Dan Berger
